DataElement.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Maximum Overall Grade Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of the maximum overall grade of acute graft versus host disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Maximum Overall Grade
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract.  Onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The largest possible quantity or degree._Including everything._A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing within the first 100 days post-transplant, but with short duration.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:Including everything.:A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
